pages.title: Festive Creeper
pages.text: Festive creepers spawn in snowy biomes. If you're playing in december, you can meet them everywhere.

pages.title: Firework Powder
pages.text: They blow up like normal creepers and igniting them makes them fly up and spawn a firework. You can get some Firework Powder if you manage to kill it. It can also be crafted manually.

pages.title: Festive Hat
pages.text: The festive hat is a fancy looking rare drop from festive creepers.
